title: What is SEO?
body: SEO, also known as Search Engine Optimization, is a technique to increase your websiteâ€™s visibility, traffic and rankings in Search Engines (Google, Yahoo or Bing).

title: Planning
body: We will provide you with the wireframing based on your specific requirements. The wireframes will help us come on the same page with the website's layout, approach, and style.

title: Design.
body: At this point, our goal is to produce a UI design that matches the expectations of your website and appeals to your customers.

title: Development
body: This step involves execution, from defining the tech architecture and choosing the right technology stack to finally turning your vision into reality.

title: Launch
body: Here comes the time for the final delivery! We will provide the final output for you to review and share feedback.
